summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (23 ties).
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (23), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (16), Sonia Marmeladov (15), Katerina Ivanovna (14)
story_summary: Svidrigailov recounts his tumultuous relationship with his late wife, Marfa Petrovna, detailing their unconventional marriage agreement that allowed him certain freedoms in exchange for his loyalty. He reflects on how Marfa's jealousy and affection complicated their life together, particularly regarding Raskolnikov's sister, Avdotya Romanovna. Svidrigailov expresses a mix of disdain and fascination for the rumors surrounding him, while also revealing his past manipulative behaviors.
